files.patch:
@@ -57,0 +57,5 @@
+
+    // Avoid issues with libjvmci failing to reserve
+    // a large virtual address space for its heap
+    args.add("-Xint"); 
+

@@ -88,0 +88,2 @@
+                "-Xint", // Avoids issues with libjvmci failing to reserve
+                         // a large virtual address space for its heap
